abstract: Civil rights investigations and lawsuits are raising pressure on Boy Scouts of America to amend its ban on openly gay leaders; organization's leader Robert M Gates has called for end to ban.
lead_paragraph: The president of the Boy Scouts of America called for an end to the organization’s ban on openly gay leaders amid the looming threat of lawsuits.

headline.main: Rising Dissent and Lawsuits Pushed Scouts to Change
headline.print_headline: Rising Dissent and Lawsuits Pushed Scouts to Change

snippet: The president of the Boy Scouts of America called for an end to the organization’s ban on openly gay leaders amid the looming threat of lawsuits.
